tool_description: Get the latest news of Harry Potter
name: Harry potter news
title: Harry potter news

api_list.name: Get individual News source news
api_list.description: Get Harry Potter news from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://harry-potter-news1.p.rapidapi.com/news/purepeople"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harry-potter-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
